messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Schooling: The Hidden Agenda
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for sharing Yol. It makes perfect sense. I passed it on to many people I know, both for and against homeschooling / unschooling. (My mom would
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for sharing Yol. It makes perfect sense.
I passed it on to many people I know, both for and against homeschooling / unschooling. (My mom would absolutely faint at the word unschooling:) The less structure we have the more she keeps telling me we need. I hope she'll read it.
Denese
----- Original Message -----
From: Yol, Vishnu & Shanti
To: Unschooling.com
Sent: Tuesday, December 17, 2002 11:01 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Schooling: The Hidden Agenda


I just found this article. It's long but very interesting, imo. Perhaps
someone else would be interested in discussing it a bit more...

http://www.ishmael.com/Education/Writings/unschooling.shtml

Yol

--
Blue Lotus Therapeutics
Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Yoga and Therapeutic Massage.
Asheville/Weaverville, NC

Weaverville, NC

letting things take their course. It cannot be ruled by interfering.
-- Tao Te Ching

Sheila
